Summary: This document contains the timetable for the AY2024/2025 semester 1 for the MTech AIS program, which runs from July to November 2024. The course will be taught by Aobo, Gary, and Zhenzhen, and will cover topics such as new media and sentiment mining, text processing using machine learning, conversational UIs, and text analytics. The course will be held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm, with the first class on July 6, 2024 and the last class on October 5, 2024. The document also includes information about the EBA5004 Graduate Certificate in Practical Language Processing and the Jan-2023 PT Intake

This page lists the course, lecturer, date, day, and time for various courses in the Graduate Certificate in Intelligent Financial Risk Management program. The courses will take place on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm starting on July 6, 2024 and ending on October 5, 2024. The courses cover topics such as advanced machine learning, explainable and responsible AI, credit risk modeling, and alternative data for fintech innovation. The timetable was last updated on August 16, 2024.

The document outlines the timetable for the PT student courses for AY2024/2025. The courses will be held on Saturdays from 9:00am to 5:00pm, starting on June 29, 2024 and ending on October 26, 2024. The exam timetable is also included, with exams taking place on November 7, 2024 in the evening. The courses cover various topics such as analytics, intelligent reasoning systems, and engineering big data. The lecturer for most of the courses is Nicholas and Nan Zhou, with the exception of a few courses. The timetable is subject to change due to unforeseen circumstances.
